title: John Goodman shows off impressive weight loss
text:

The Trumbo star has been busy hitting red carpets to promote his new film, and Goodman, 63, has never looked happier – or healthier, for that matter. Oh hey there, John Goodman! The Trumbo star has been busy hitting red carpets to promote his new film, and Goodman, 63, has never looked happier – or healthier, for that matter. 
Whatever he's been up to, it's working! Goodman's all smiles 
Goodman shared that at his all time high the actor was "pushing 400" pounds. Read or Share this story: http://on.wtsp.com/1Lm5CNK More Stories
